name: Carl Fredrik Scheffer
obverse: Bust of Carl Fredrik Scheffer facing right.
obverse_inscriptions: GR. CARL FR. SCHEFFER SV. R. RÅD.
description: Carl Fredrik Scheffer (28 April 1715, Nyköping - 27 August 1786, Trolleholm Castle) was a Swedish count, diplomat, privy counsellor, politician and writer.
This medal is a cliché: a uniface impression made from engraved dies.
